meanings.definition: A slang term for a barber.
meanings.sent1: My dad is a sweeney who cuts hair at the local barbershop.
meanings.sent2: I need to visit the sweeney to get a haircut before the party.
meanings.sent3: The sweeney accidentally gave me a buzz cut instead of a trim!
meanings.sent4: The sweeney's scissors danced like magic around my head.
meanings.sent5: The sweeney's shop smelled of shaving cream and aftershave.

meanings.sent1: Sweeney is a common surname in Ireland.
meanings.sent2: I wonder if Mr. Sweeney is related to the famous author.
meanings.sent3: The teacher called out 'Mr. Sweeney' and two students turned around!
meanings.sent4: The name Sweeney echoed through the halls of the courthouse.
meanings.sent5: The Sweeney family reunion was a joyful gathering of relatives.
